title: Aune Heggebø
text:
Aune Selland Heggebø (born 29 July 2001) is a <a href="Norway">Norwegian</a> <a href="association%20football">football</a> player who plays as a <a href="Striker%20%28association%20football%29">striker</a> <a href="SK%20Brann">Brann</a> in the <a href="Norwegian%20Premier%20League">Norwegian Premier League</a>.
Club career.
Heggebø was born in Bergen and played youth football with <a href="IL%20Bjarg">IL Bjarg</a> and SK Brann before starting his professional career at the same club. In 2019 he had a short loan spell at <a href="Nest-Sotra%20Fotball">Nest-Sotra</a> in <a href="Norwegian%20First%20Division">Norwegian First Division</a>.
In the 2021 season he became the preferred choice after his teammate <a href="Daouda%20Bamba">Daouda Bamba</a> transferred in the summer transfer window, and his contract with SK Brann was extended to 2025 in early november 2021.
